snippet: The most successful players at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan last month were Judith Bianco, Win Allegaert, Hemant Lall and Justin Lall.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The most successful players at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional in Manhattan last month were Judith Bianco, Win Allegaert, Hemant Lall and Justin Lall.
